NORTH ATLANTIC.
40 FOOT M/V BRITISH SOLDIER, TEN PERSONS ON BOARD,
DISMASTED AND ADRIFT VICINITY 20-59N 034-38W AT 020910Z DEC.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST
IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC DELGADA, TELEX: 40460747,
PHONE: 3512 9628 1777, FAX: 3512 9620 5239,
E-MAIL: MRCC.DELGADA@MARINHA.PT.
